entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
